message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $170. I think it would be a great fit for you, what do you think?
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $170 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget concerns, but I can't go as low as $90.  How about we meet in the middle at $130?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $130 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $110.
